control.name: icbScrollBars
control.description: This combo box allows the visibility of scroll bars to be specified. If the WordWrap check box is checked, the horizontal scroll bar isn't displayed.

control.name: ceWordWrap
control.description: This check box switches automatic word wrapping on or off.

control.name: ceIcon
control.description: This check box allows you to specify whether an identification icon is displayed. This icon is used to identify the type of data stored within the editor and to inform end users as to whether or not the editor contains data.

control.name: cePopupSizeable
control.description: This check box allows you to specify whether end users can change the size of the editor's popup window by dragging the resize grip at the window's right bottom corner.

control.name: ceCustomIcons
control.description: This check box controls whether default or custom images are used to indicate whether the edior contains data.

hint.name: memoExEditSample
